code: import React from"react";import{Field,reduxForm}from"redux-form";import{compose}from"redux";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import renderFormGroupField from"../../helpers/renderFormGroupField";import{required,maxLengthMobileNo,minLengthMobileNo,digit}from"../../helpers/validation";import{ReactComponent as IconPhone}from"bootstrap-icons/icons/phone.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ForgotPasswordForm=props=>{const{handleSubmit,submitting,onSubmit,submitFailed}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit(onSubmit),className:`needs-validation ${submitFailed?"was-validated":""}`,noValidate:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{name:"mobileNo",type:"number",label:"Mobile no",component:renderFormGroupField,placeholder:"Mobile no without country code",icon:IconPhone,validate:[required,maxLengthMobileNo,minLengthMobileNo,digit],required:true,max:"999999999999999",min:"9999",className:"mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-grid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary mb-3",disabled:submitting,children:"Submit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"float-start",to:"/account/signup",title:"Sign Up",children:"Create your account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"float-end",to:"/account/signin",title:"Sign In",children:"Sign In"})]});};export default compose(reduxForm({form:"forgotpassword"}))(ForgotPasswordForm);
